title: Umm firewall error just popped up cant rejoin game?
body: I cant get into game firewall error thing just came up and i cant reconnect keeps saying i crashed

replies.body:
Try running the repair and see if that fixes it.

Close league, open it, click the "?" and click repair. Can take up to 30mins sometimes.

If that doesn't work, you can always go into your C: drive, delete the league folder and redownload a fresh copy.

This problem has happened to me a few times. I've come to the point of just spam clicking reconnect until it works. Sometimes it does after 6-7 attempts. But then I do the repair thing if it happens again.
